thread.title: P. Ward

author: P. Ward
title: P. Ward
text: My kids had a favorite book, and because it was the favorite it ended up being destroyed. I tried to find another copy of the book but it was at least $25 everywhere I shopped. I found the book on this site and I thought why not give it a shot. The book came in and it's perfect. My kids are happy and I'm happy. So much so that I bought another copy of the book for a friend of theirs. I would definitely recommend this site.
